entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
